Producer: Alex Cirillo, Wendy Guerrero, Jessica Hester, Dani Faith Leonard, Derek Schweickart
Production Co: Gemini Team Go, A Journey Home Film, Big Vision Empty Wallet, Straight Up Studios, LLC, Publicly Private
Synopsis: Set in a Central Californian farming community, COAST revolves around 16-year-old Abby, who is desperate to escape the trappings of small-town life. When she falls for the lead singer of a touring rock band, Abby must decide whether to leave her family and friends behind in search of a better life.
Title: Coast
